acf.egsr_quicktip: YOU’RE ABLE TO ACHIEVE ANYTHING, BUT MUST USE YOUR WISDOM TO BALANCE YOUR EFFORTS
acf.egsr_step1_descr:
YOU’RE ABLE TO ACHIEVE ANYTHING, BUT MUST USE YOUR WISDOM TO BALANCE YOUR EFFORTS

{FIRSTNAME}, I’m picking up the vibrations of a wise old soul, filled with optimism, generosity and grace.

Wow... I can feel your soul resonating with deep knowledge and wisdom, earned and gathered over many lifetimes…

And when you’re at your best... all this wisdom allows you to see a big picture overview… whatever the situation…

In fact... I sense a powerful ability to plan to perfection, see the talents of others, give perfect advice, work quietly and steadily… always making things happen so that life runs smoothly.

Your wise old soul also knows... there’s no point in drama.

You’ve probably spent your whole life avoiding pointless battles of ego, preferring to put forth more effort than your peers...

as long as it means keeping the peace… or having a chance to be generous.

And you probably have known for many years that you were born to complete an extremely important mission to help humanity at this critical time.

But... I sense there’s something out of balance that is preventing you from truly living your divine purpose and achieving your dreams…

I also can tell that you are at a crossroads in your life regarding moving toward achieving that balance now so you can fulfill your divine mission in service to humanity.

From my reading today I feel that an additional “Energy Reading” is necessary to find out exactly what’s been holding you back from completing your mission…
acf.egsr_step2_descr:
IF YOU WANT YOUR EFFORTS TO MAKE A DIFFERENCE, YOU MUST ACCEPT YOUR BEST IS GOOD ENOUGH

{FIRSTNAME}, I can feel your energy has a sense of great purpose…

Its vibrant, powerful flow is connected to the Earth’s frequency… channelled to making a difference here in the world.

And as your soul continues to learn… your energy adapts its flow to suit each new situation.

But... there’s something blocking that flow.

Do you find yourself being overly critical about yourself sometimes {FIRSTNAME}?

When we know better… it’s common to kick ourselves for the very human mistakes we all make…

In your quest for perfection… you can be too hard on yourself… stirring up deep-seated fears of not being “good enough” ever.

This can pull your energy in a negative direction… manifesting in frustration or self-loathing when things don't live up to your extremely high expectations.

But often… the FEAR can be worse than the thing we’re fearful of.

If you listen to the whispers of your wise soul, it knows... there’s no point in highlighting mistakes. We all learn and grow. This is the way forward.
“Less can be more” could be a powerful mantra for you.

Your path to banishing negative energy… and opening up your energetic flow lies in allowing your best efforts (and the best efforts of others) to be good enough.

This way you’ll raise your vibration, connecting deeper to your soul, which continues to grow in wisdom.

This is a very critical time on your path, {FIRSTNAME}. The decisions you make at this time will have a huge impact on your life for years to come.

And the way to know if you’re on the right path is usually found through a light reading…

I’d like to give you one for free, but first I need to ask you a few questions…
acf.egsr_step3_descr:
Forever shining on the unknown… and revealing new truths.

But the pull of darker energies caused by perfectionism can sometimes obscure your light… keeping you from achieving the things closest to your heart.

I believe there’s an amazing opportunity on the horizon for you…

In the next chapter of your life… your soul can truly grow... empowering you to evolve in any direction you choose.

You’re passionate about discovery, {FIRSTNAME}… about uncovering the why.

The answers you seek are right here.

NOW is the time to let the pureness of your inner light shine... on anything you touch.
